title: Adults Swim
lyrics:
Yuh, yuh, okay, yuh
But I wanted to show you
Hmm, okay, bitch, yuh
Common sense is to compromise
When everybody 'round you talking nice

That is a yes man, recognize (recognize)

I am appalled by the battles I fight (I fight)

I'll let them all think a nigga too nice (too nice)

Like when a nigga say they dog don't bite, yuh, huh (bitch)

I shake shit like a lime in a coconut

Smoking dark green weed, my bitch call it ogre nut

Forbidden fruit in my diet, get my wisdom up, yuh, huh

(get it, get it, get it, get it, get it)

I'm like shucks shit, shawty got a big butt

Clout is a hell of a drug, that's why she give you a suck

We been through it, bitch let's do it (yeah, yah)

Ooh, what you do?

Pour the Henny, yeah, shoot (yeah, yeah, yeah)

Psst, splash the goon and the moon (psst)

Nickelodeon (nick), with my slimes, let em' Ooze

Like Mustela, bought Margiela

I got back my groove

You were a square like in a Rubik

All on my dick like the hair on my pubic

She said, "you ready?" look at her stupid

'Cause she got a diaper booty like Cupid

Want a hard move like wingman do it

Money how I talk, bitch, I speak fluent

Smokin' on stank, smell like a sewer

How was you feeling vro, bitch like the four



Like haiku, I speak smooth

They tryna fuck up my mood

Don't be cool when you round, fuck gotta cool up my mood

Like same ooh, black-white fur

Designer jacket cover my nude

Take it serious, that is period, don't fuck up my groove

Like haiku, I speak smooth

They tryna fuck up my mood

Don't be cool when you round, fuck gotta cool up my mood

Like same ooh, black-white fur

Designer jacket cover my nude

Take it serious, that is period, don't fuck up my groove
